comment:
Extracted Variables:
- Decision Variables:
  - \( x_1 \): kg of raspberries to be harvested at the old farm
  - \( x_2 \): kg of blueberries to be harvested at the old farm
  - \( x_3 \): kg of strawberries to be harvested at the old farm
  - \( y_1 \): kg of raspberries to be harvested at the new farm
  - \( y_2 \): kg of blueberries to be harvested at the new farm
  - \( y_3 \): kg of strawberries to be harvested at the new farm

- Constants:
  - \( C_{\text{old}} = 300 \): cost to operate the old farm per day (in dollars)
  - \( C_{\text{new}} = 200 \): cost to operate the new farm per day (in dollars)
  - \( D_{\text{rasp}} = 10 \): kg of raspberries required by the store
  - \( D_{\text{blue}} = 9 \): kg of blueberries required by the store
  - \( D_{\text{straw}} = 15 \): kg of strawberries required by the store

- Coefficients:
  - \( P_{\text{rasp,old}} = 2 \): kg of raspberries harvested at the old farm per day
  - \( P_{\text{blue,old}} = 2 \): kg of blueberries harvested at the old farm per day
  - \( P_{\text{straw,old}} = 4 \): kg of strawberries harvested at the old farm per day
  - \( P_{\text{rasp,new}} = 4 \): kg of raspberries harvested at the new farm per day
  - \( P_{\text{blue,new}} = 1 \): kg of blueberries harvested at the new farm per day
  - \( P_{\text{straw,new}} = 2 \): kg of strawberries harvested at the new farm per day

- Objective:
  - Minimize the total cost: \( \text{Minimize} \quad Z = C_{\text{old}}(x_1 + x_2 + x_3) + C_{\text{new}}(y_1 + y_2 + y_3) \)

- Constraints:
  - Harvested quantities must meet the store's requirements:
    - Raspberries: \( x_1 + y_1 \geq D_{\text{rasp}} \)
    - Blueberries: \( x_2 + y_2 \geq D_{\text{blue}} \)
    - Strawberries: \( x_3 + y_3 \geq D_{\text{straw}} \)
  - Non-negativity constraints:
    - \( x_1, x_2, x_3, y_1, y_2, y_3 \geq 0 \)
